Package net.silthus.schat.message

Class Messages

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
java.util.AbstractList<Message>
net.silthus.schat.message.Messages
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Message>, Collection<Message>, List<Message>, FilterableCollection<Message>
public final class Messages extends AbstractList<Message> implements FilterableCollection<Message>
A container for messages that can be used to store and persist messages in memory.
Since:
next

  • Method Details

    • unmodifiable

      @NotNull public static @NotNull @Unmodifiable Messages unmodifiable(@NonNull @NonNull Messages messages)

      Returns an unmodifiable view of the messages container. Query operations on the returned targets "read through" to the specified messages, and attempts to modify the returned messages, whether direct or via its iterator, result in an UnsupportedOperationException.

      Parameters:
      messages - the messages for which an unmodifiable view is to be returned.
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable view of the message container.
      Since:
      next
